name: Rapper Name Generator 2653
description:
This started as an in-joke between some friends of mine and I, before I made it into this, which took about two days (Not of constant work). I made this pretty quickly after C:E, not sure why it took me so long to upload it here.

Choose settings for both halves of the name, with choices like "Rapper" (Typical Rapper Name stuff, probably), "NOT Rapper" (Names You'd never hear a Rapper using), and, like, two others. You can also lock either word in place and change only the other. 

After a name is generated, it will be read out by a robot voice that definitely isn't just my bad atari voice synthesizer impression put through several effects in audacity. Definitely not.

In-Game Font is Pixel LCD7 by Style 7. https://www.dafont.com/pixel-lcd7.font
